alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 6:25PM EDT until August 10 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN PULASKI AND WEST CENTRAL ROCKCASTLE COUNTIES... At 625 PM EDT, Video footage from the public showed roadway blocked by flash flooding in the Eubank area. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Woodstock, Bandy, Bee Lick, Willailla, Quail, Level Green, Bromo, Spiro and Eubank. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
